articles.description: The Minnesota Timberwolves rallied from 22 points down in the fourth against the west best Oklahoma City Thunder thanks to three rookies.
articles.content: The torch wasnt passed Monday night at Paycom Center in Oklahoma City, but it was borrowed honorably, and hoisted high during a stunning, late-game rampage through the best basketball team in the Wes… [+11989 chars]
